I

IExtendedSongInfo - Interface in org.jdesktop.jdic.mpcontrol
Some of the players provides a more detailed description about the song, in this case they will return this interface, instead of the basic ISongInfo
IMediaPlayer - Interface in org.jdesktop.jdic.mpcontrol
This is the main interface for communicating with the native players.
init() - Method in interface org.jdesktop.jdic.mpcontrol.IMediaPlayer
initialize the media player - create the nativ resources to access it, or start the external process, this method must be called before any other method.
isAvailableMediaPlayer() - Method in interface org.jdesktop.jdic.mpcontrol.IMediaPlayer
returns true if the media player is supported on this platform.
